verses.text: Then all the \w captains|strong="H8269"\w* of the \w forces|strong="H2428"\w*, and \w Johanan|strong="H3110"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Kareah|strong="H7143"\w*, and \w Jezaniah|strong="H3153"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Hoshaiah|strong="H1955"\w*, and all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* from the \w least|strong="H6996"\w* even unto the \w greatest|strong="H1419"\w*, came \w near|strong="H5066"\w*,

And \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w* the \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w*, Let, we beseech thee, our \w supplication|strong="H8467"\w* be \w accepted|strong="H5307"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* thee, and \w pray|strong="H6419"\w* for us unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \add even\add* for all this \w remnant|strong="H7611"\w*; (for we are \w left|strong="H7604"\w* \add but\add* a \w few|strong="H4592"\w* of \w many|strong="H7235"\w*, as thine \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* do \w behold|strong="H7200"\w* us:)\f + \fr 42.2 \ft Let…: or, Let our supplication fall before thee\f*

That the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* may \w shew|strong="H5046"\w* us the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* wherein we may \w walk|strong="H3212"\w*, and the \w thing|strong="H1697"\w* that we may \w do|strong="H6213"\w*.

Then \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w* the \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, I have \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \add you;\add* behold, I will \w pray|strong="H6419"\w* unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w* according to your \w words|strong="H1697"\w*; and it shall come to pass, \add that\add* whatsoever \w thing|strong="H1697"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* shall \w answer|strong="H6030"\w* you, I will \w declare|strong="H5046"\w* \add it\add* unto you; I will \w keep|strong="H4513"\w* \w nothing|strong="H1697"\w* \w back|strong="H4513"\w* from you.

Then they \w said|strong="H0559"\w* to \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w*, The 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* be a \w true|strong="H0571"\w* and \w faithful|strong="H0539"\w* \w witness|strong="H5707"\w* between us, if we \w do|strong="H6213"\w* not even according to all \w things|strong="H1697"\w* for the which the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* shall \w send|strong="H7971"\w* thee to us.

Whether \add it be\add* \w good|strong="H2896"\w*, or whether \add it be\add* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*, we will \w obey|strong="H8085"\w* the \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* our \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, to whom \w we|strong="H0580"\w* \w send|strong="H7971"\w* thee; that it may be \w well|strong="H3190"\w* with us, when we \w obey|strong="H8085"\w* the \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* our \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

¶ And it came to pass \w after|strong="H7093"\w* \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*, that the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* came unto \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w*.

Then \w called|strong="H7121"\w* he \w Johanan|strong="H3110"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Kareah|strong="H7143"\w*, and all the \w captains|strong="H8269"\w* of the \w forces|strong="H2428"\w* which \add were\add* with him, and all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* from the \w least|strong="H6996"\w* even to the \w greatest|strong="H1419"\w*,

And \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, the \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, unto whom ye \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* me to \w present|strong="H5307"\w* your \w supplication|strong="H8467"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* him;

If ye will \w still|strong="H7725"\w* \w abide|strong="H3427"\w* in this \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, then will I \w build|strong="H1129"\w* you, and not pull \add you\add* \w down|strong="H2040"\w*, and I will \w plant|strong="H5193"\w* you, and not pluck \add you\add* \w up|strong="H5428"\w*: for I \w repent|strong="H5162"\w* me of the \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* that I have \w done|strong="H6213"\w* unto you.

Be not \w afraid|strong="H3372"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w*, of \w whom|strong="H6440"\w* ye are \w afraid|strong="H3373"\w*; be not \w afraid|strong="H3372"\w* of him, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: for I \add am\add* with you to \w save|strong="H3467"\w* you, and to \w deliver|strong="H5337"\w* you from his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*.

And I will \w shew|strong="H5414"\w* \w mercies|strong="H7356"\w* unto you, that he may have \w mercy|strong="H7355"\w* upon you, and cause you to \w return|strong="H7725"\w* to your own \w land|strong="H0127"\w*.

¶ But if ye \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, We will not \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* in this \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, neither \w obey|strong="H8085"\w* the \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w*,

\w Saying|strong="H0559"\w*, No; but we will \w go|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, where we shall \w see|strong="H7200"\w* no \w war|strong="H4421"\w*, nor \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* the \w sound|strong="H6963"\w* of the \w trumpet|strong="H7782"\w*, nor have \w hunger|strong="H7456"\w* of \w bread|strong="H3899"\w*; and there will we \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w*:

And now therefore \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, ye \w remnant|strong="H7611"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*; Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, the \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*; If ye \w wholly|strong="H7760"\w* \w set|strong="H7760"\w* your \w faces|strong="H6440"\w* to \w enter|strong="H0935"\w* into \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, and \w go|strong="H0935"\w* to \w sojourn|strong="H1481"\w* there;

Then it shall come to pass, \add that\add* the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, which ye \w feared|strong="H3373"\w*, shall \w overtake|strong="H5381"\w* you there in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, and the \w famine|strong="H7458"\w*, whereof ye were \w afraid|strong="H1672"\w*, shall follow \w close|strong="H1692"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* you there in \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*; and there ye shall \w die|strong="H4191"\w*.\f + \fr 42.16 \ft shall follow…: Heb. shall cleave after you\f*

So shall it be with all the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* that \w set|strong="H7760"\w* their \w faces|strong="H6440"\w* to \w go|strong="H0935"\w* into \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* to \w sojourn|strong="H1481"\w* there; they shall \w die|strong="H4191"\w* by the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, by the \w famine|strong="H7458"\w*, and by the \w pestilence|strong="H1698"\w*: and none of them shall \w remain|strong="H8300"\w* or \w escape|strong="H6412"\w* \w from|strong="H6440"\w* the \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* that I will \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* upon them.\f + \fr 42.17 \ft So…: Heb. So shall all the men be\f*

For thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, the \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*; As mine \w anger|strong="H0639"\w* and my \w fury|strong="H2534"\w* hath been poured \w forth|strong="H5413"\w* upon the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* of \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*; so shall my \w fury|strong="H2534"\w* be poured \w forth|strong="H5413"\w* upon you, when ye shall \w enter|strong="H0935"\w* into \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*: and ye shall be an \w execration|strong="H0423"\w*, and an \w astonishment|strong="H8047"\w*, and a \w curse|strong="H7045"\w*, and a \w reproach|strong="H2781"\w*; and ye shall \w see|strong="H7200"\w* this \w place|strong="H4725"\w* no more.

¶ The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath \w said|strong="H1696"\w* concerning you, O ye \w remnant|strong="H7611"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*; \w Go|strong="H0935"\w* ye not into \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*: \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w certainly|strong="H3045"\w* that I have \w admonished|strong="H5749"\w* you this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.\f + \fr 42.19 \ft admonished…: Heb. testified against you\f*

For ye \w dissembled|strong="H8582"\w* in your \w hearts|strong="H5315"\w*, when ye \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* me unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Pray|strong="H6419"\w* for us unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* our \w God|strong="H0430"\w*; and according unto all that the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* our \w God|strong="H0430"\w* shall \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, so \w declare|strong="H5046"\w* unto us, and we will \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \add it\add*.  +  r 42.20  t ye dissembled…: or, ye have used deceit against your souls *

And \add now\add* I have this \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w declared|strong="H5046"\w* \add it\add* to you; but ye have not \w obeyed|strong="H8085"\w* the \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, nor any \add thing\add* for the which he hath \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* me unto you.

Now therefore \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w certainly|strong="H3045"\w* that ye shall \w die|strong="H4191"\w* by the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, by the \w famine|strong="H7458"\w*, and by the \w pestilence|strong="H1698"\w*, in the \w place|strong="H4725"\w* whither ye \w desire|strong="H2654"\w* to \w go|strong="H0935"\w* \add and\add* to \w sojourn|strong="H1481"\w*.\f + \fr 42.22 \ft to go…: or, to go to sojourn\f*
